thread.title: J-K: Encounter underway with terrorists in Kulgam
thread.title_full: J-K: Encounter underway with terrorists in Kulgam

title: J-K: Encounter underway with terrorists in Kulgam

organizations.name: indian express online media pvt ltd

text:
J-K: Encounter underway with terrorists in Kulgam J-K: Encounter underway with terrorists in Kulgam Two bodies have been recovered by the forces. The operation is still underway. Published:February 12, 2017 10:00 am Two bodies have been recovered by the forces. The operation is still underway. (Source: ANI) 
Security forces in Jammu-Kashmir’s Kulgam are currently engaged in an encounter with suspected militants. The exchange of gun fire began on Sunday morning in Yaripora. Two bodies have been recovered by the forces, news agency ANI reported. The operation is still underway. 
Earlier on February 4, the security forces shot dead two top Kashmiri militants while they were trying to enter politically sensitive Sopore town in Jammu and Kashmir’s north-western Baramulla district. Two police officials were injured in initial response from the duo during the encounter. © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
